items.summary: Super Rugby is a men's professional rugby union club competition involving teams from Australia, Fiji, New Zealand, and the Pacific Islands. It previously included teams from Argentina, Japan, and South Africa.
items.title: [COLOR=red][B]Super Sport Rugby[/B][/COLOR]
